00024 template <class T> inline void SafeDelete(T* &ptr)
00025 {
00026         if(ptr)
00027         {
00028                 delete ptr;
00029                 ptr = 0; 
00030         }
00031 }

00036 #include <QMessageBox>

00040 inline void _Debug_Msg (const QString & m, const QString & file, int line)
00041 {
00042     qDebug() << "file: " << file << " line: " << line << " " << m;
00043 }
00044 
00045 inline void _Assert_Msg (const QString msg, const QString & file, int line)
00046 {
00047     // strip directory info
00048     int index = file.lastIndexOf("/");
00049     QString f = file.mid (index+1);
00050     QString m = QString ("file: %1 line: %2\n%3").arg (f).arg(line).arg(msg);
00051 
00052     //
00053     _Debug_Msg (m, file, line);
00054 
00055     //
00056     QMessageBox::information(0, "assert failed", m);
00057     Q_ASSERT (false);
00058 }
00059 
00060 inline void _Assert_Msg2 (const QString & msg1, const QString & msg2, const QString & file, int line)
00061 {
00062    _Assert_Msg (QString("%1 : %2").arg(msg1).arg(msg2), file, line);
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 inline void _Break_Here (const QString & file, int line)
00067 {
00068     // strip directory info
00069     int index = file.lastIndexOf("/");
00070     QString f = file.mid (index+1);
00071     QString m = QString ("file: %1 line: %2").arg (f, line);
00072 
00073     //
00074     _Debug_Msg (m, file, line);
00075 
00076     //
00077     QMessageBox::information(0, "code break", m);
00078     Q_ASSERT (false);
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 
00083 inline void _Break_Here (const QString & file, const QString & line)
00084 {
00085         // strip directory info
00086         int index = file.lastIndexOf("/");
00087         QString f = file.mid (index+1);
00088         QString m = QString ("file: %1 line: %2").arg (f, line);
00089 
00090         QMessageBox::information(0, "code break", m);
00091         Q_ASSERT (false);
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 #ifdef QT_DEBUG
00096     #define BT_DEBUG_MSG(msg) (_Debug_Msg((msg),__FILE__,__LINE__) )
00097     #define BT_BREAK_HERE() (_Break_Here(__FILE__, QString::number(__LINE__)) )
00098     #define BT_ASSERT_MSG(test, msg) ((!(test)) ? _Assert_Msg((msg), __FILE__, __LINE__) : qt_noop() )
00099     #define BT_ASSERT_MSG2(test, msg1, msg2) ((!(test)) ? _Assert_Msg2((msg1), (msg2), __FILE__, __LINE__) : qt_noop() )
00100 
00101 
00102 #else
00103 
00104     #define BT_DEBUG_MSG(msg) {}
00105     #define BT_ASSERT_MSG_X(test, where, msg) {}
00106     #define BT_ASSERT_MSG(test, msg) {}
00107     #define BT_ASSERT_MSG2(test, msg1, msg2) {}
00108     #define BT_BREAK_HERE() {}
00109 
00110 #endif
00111         
00112         
00113 #endif

00122 extern "C"{
00123 #include "./BlueSoleil_SDK_2.0.5/include/Btsdk_ui.h"
00124 }
00125 
00126 using namespace std;
00127 
00128 
00129 // used to have the number of the classes that use the Bluesoleil SDK.
00130 // if the number reaches zero the sdk is deinitialized.
00131 static size_t sdkInitializationCounter = 0;
00132 
00133 static bool InitBthSdk()
00134 {
00135         if ( sdkInitializationCounter == 0) /* not connected with BlueSoleil */
00136         {
00137                 if (Btsdk_Init() != BTSDK_OK)
00138                         return false;
00139 
00140                 if (Btsdk_IsBluetoothReady() == BTSDK_FALSE)
00141                         Btsdk_StartBluetooth();
00142                         
00143                 BTUINT16 discoveryFlags = BTSDK_CONNECTABLE | BTSDK_PAIRABLE | BTSDK_GENERAL_DISCOVERABLE;
00144                 Btsdk_SetDiscoveryMode(discoveryFlags);
00145                 Btsdk_SetLocalDeviceClass(BTSDK_COMPCLS_DESKTOP);
00146         }
00147         sdkInitializationCounter++;
00148         
00149         return true;
00150 }
00151 
00152 static void DeinitBthSdk()
00153 {
00154         if(Btsdk_IsSDKInitialized() && sdkInitializationCounter > 0)
00155         {
00156                 sdkInitializationCounter--;
00157                 if(sdkInitializationCounter == 0)
00158                         Btsdk_Done();
00159         }
00160 }
00161 
00162 static BTDEVHDL GetDeviceHandle(QBtAddress& address)
00163 {
00164         //get device handle
00165         BTDEVHDL devHandle = BTSDK_INVALID_HANDLE;
00166         BTUINT8 btAddr [6]= {0};
00167         QByteArray btAddrQt = address.toReversedByteArray();
00168         memcpy(btAddr, btAddrQt.constData(), btAddrQt.size());
00169         devHandle = Btsdk_GetRemoteDeviceHandle(btAddr);
00170         return devHandle;
00171 }
00172 #endif // Q_OS_WIN32
